resources.title: TroubleShooting Setup
resources.name: troubleshooting_setup
resources.description: How to prepare your environment for effective troubleshooting, including enabling logs and diagnostic features.

resources.title: Reset Dropinbase
resources.name: reset_dropinbase
resources.description: Steps for resetting Dropinbase when configuration or system issues arise. Useful when the platform needs a clean internal state.

resources.title: General Troubleshooting Tips
resources.name: general_troubleshooting_tips
resources.description: A collection of practical troubleshooting tips that address common issues and improve debugging workflows.

resources.title: Debug PHP
resources.name: debug_php
resources.description: Guidance on debugging PHP within Dropinbase, including logging, breakpoints, and recommended tools.

resources.title: Container Compile Error
resources.name: container_compile_error
resources.description: Explains the causes of container compilation failures and how to resolve issues within generated components.

resources.title: Release Manager is not creating UI files
resources.name: release_manager_not_creating_ui_files
resources.description: Describes troubleshooting steps for when the Release Manager fails to generate required UI files.

resources.title: Dropdownlists where Foreign Keys Point to Non-Primary Keys
resources.name: dropdownlists_foreign_keys_non_primary
resources.description: Explains why dropdowns referencing non-primary key fields may behave unexpectedly and how to fix incorrect foreign key relationships.

resources.title: I forgot my password
resources.name: i_forgot_my_password
resources.description: Instructions for recovering or resetting a lost Dropinbase password and restoring access to the system.
